## Practice Question

For which model do we obtain estimates by minimizing the expression

$$\sum_{i=1}^n \widehat{u}_i^2$$

1. The simple linear regression model
2. The multiple linear regression model
3. Both (1) and (2)
4. None of the above

<div id="spoiler" style="display:none">
Answer: (3). The ordinary **least squares** estimate is always obtained by minimizing the sum of squared residuals for the model.
</div>
